title: The fine spectral expansion of the Rankin-Selberg period
summary: We state and prove the spectral expansion of the theta series attached to the Rankin-Selberg spherical variety $(\mathrm{GL}_{n+1} \times \mathrm{GL}_n)/\mathrm{GL}_n$. This is a key result towards the fine spectral expansion of the Jacquet-Rallis trace formula. Our expansion is written in terms of regularized Rankin--Selberg periods for non-tempered automorphic representations, which we show compute special values of $L$-functions. The proof relies on shifts of contours of integration à la Langlands. We also establish two technical but crucial results on bounds and singularities for discrete Eisenstein series of $\mathrm{GL}_n$ in the positive Weyl chamber.

AI.tldr: 论文证明了Rankin-Selberg球面簇(GLn+1×GLn)/GLn的theta级数的谱展开，这是Jacquet-Rallis迹公式精细谱展开的关键结果。展开式用非调和平稳表示的规范化Rankin-Selberg周期表示，并证明这些周期计算L-函数的特殊值。证明依赖于Langlands风格的积分围道移动，同时建立了GLn离散Eisenstein级数在正Weyl室中的界和奇异性两个关键技术结果。
AI.motivation: 为实现Jacquet-Rallis迹公式的精细谱展开，需要先建立相关theta级数的谱展开。这是通往迹公式谱展开的关键一步，对理解自守形式与L-函数的关系有重要意义。
AI.method: 1. 证明Rankin-Selberg球面簇theta级数的谱展开；2. 使用规范化Rankin-Selberg周期表示展开式；3. 通过Langlands风格的积分围道移动技术进行证明；4. 建立GLn离散Eisenstein级数在正Weyl室中的界和奇异性技术结果。
AI.result: 成功建立了theta级数的完整谱展开公式，该公式用规范化Rankin-Selberg周期表示，并证明了这些周期计算L-函数的特殊值。同时获得了关于离散Eisenstein级数的技术性边界和奇异性结果。
AI.conclusion: 本文证明了Rankin-Selberg球面簇theta级数的谱展开，为Jacquet-Rallis迹公式的精细谱展开奠定了基础。所建立的规范化周期与L-函数特殊值的联系，深化了自守表示与L-函数理论的理解。相关技术结果为后续研究提供了重要工具。

title: Joint extreme values of the Riemann zeta function at harmonic points
summary: Using the resonance method, we obtain refined estimates for joint extreme values of the Riemann zeta function at harmonic points, improving upon Levinson's 1972 results and providing new insight into the behavior of the Riemann zeta function. Our proof is primarily based on Dirichlet series theory and the truncated Euler product for the Riemann zeta function. As a corollary, we can recover some previously known extreme value results for the zeta function.

AI.tldr: 本文改进了利用共振方法估算黎曼ζ函数在调和点处联合极值的结果，优于Levinson 1972年的工作，并提供了对ζ函数行为的新见解
AI.motivation: Levinson在1972年使用共振方法研究了黎曼ζ函数在调和点处的联合极值，本文旨在改进这些估计结果，并提供对黎曼ζ函数行为更深入的理解
AI.method: 主要基于狄利克雷级数理论和黎曼ζ函数的截断欧拉乘积，通过改进的共振方法进行分析
AI.result: 获得了黎曼ζ函数在调和点处联合极值的精细估计，改进了Levinson的原有结果，并且能够恢复一些已知的黎曼ζ函数极值结果
AI.conclusion: 通过改进的共振方法成功获得了黎曼ζ函数联合极值的更好估计，为理解ζ函数的极端行为提供了新的见解

title: Powerful Fibonacci polynomials over finite fields
summary: Bugeaud, Mignotte, and Siksek proved that the only perfect powers in Fibonacci sequence are 0, 1, 8, and 144. In this paper, we study the polynomial analogue of the problem. Especially, we give a complete characterization of the Fibonacci polynomials that are perfect powers or powerful over finite fields, where there are infinitely many of them. We also give similar characterizations for some of Horadam's generalized Lucas polynomial sequences, which include Fibonacci, Lucas, Chebyshev, and Jacobsthal polynomials.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究斐波那契多项式的完美幂和幂次问题及其有限域上的完整分类，并推广到Horadam广义卢卡斯多项式序列
AI.motivation: Bugeaud等人证明了斐波那契数列中仅有的完美幂是0,1,8和144，本文旨在研究该问题的多项式类比，探索斐波那契多项式中完美幂或幂次结构在有限域上的表现
AI.method: 通过研究多项式在有限域上的性质，对斐波那契多项式中的完美幂和幂次结构进行完整分类，并将方法推广到Horadam广义卢卡斯多项式序列（包括卢卡斯、切比雪夫和雅各布斯塔尔多项式）
AI.result: 获得了斐波那契多项式在有限域上为完美幂或幂次的完整特征描述，并证明存在无穷多个这样的多项式，同时给出了部分Horadam广义卢卡斯多项式序列的类似分类结果
AI.conclusion: 成功将经典数论问题（斐波那契数列中的完美幂）推广到多项式领域，建立了有限域上斐波那契多项式和广义卢卡斯多项式序列中完美幂结构的系统理论

title: Counting Polynomial-type Exceptional Units on Algebraic Varieties over Number Fields
summary: Previous research on exceptional units has primarily focused on the ring of rational integers or abstract finite rings, often restricted to linear or quadratic constraints. In this paper, we extend the concept of polynomial-type exceptional units to the ring of integers of an arbitrary algebraic number field. We investigate the number of these polynomial-type exceptional units on general algebraic varieties. By employing the Chinese Remainder Theorem and Hensel's lifting technique, we derive an exact counting formula for the number of these exceptional units on a smooth closed subscheme under the assumption of good reduction. Furthermore, using the Lang-Weil inequality, we establish an asymptotic estimate for the counting function. In particular, we prove that for varieties of degree at most two, the error term can be significantly improved, yielding a sharper asymptotic bound.

AI.tldr: 本文将多项式型例外单位的概念扩展到任意代数数域的整数环中，研究了一般代数簇上这类例外单位的数量。通过中国剩余定理和Hensel提升技术，在良好约化假设下推导了平滑闭子概形上例外单位的精确计数公式。利用Lang-Weil不等式建立了计数函数的渐近估计，对于次数不超过2的簇改进了误差项。
AI.motivation: 先前关于例外单位的研究主要局限于有理整数环或抽象有限环，通常限于线性或二次约束。本文旨在将多项式型例外单位扩展到更一般的代数数域整数环中，研究更广泛代数簇上的分布规律。
AI.method: 主要方法包括：1) 将多项式型例外单位扩展到代数数域整数环；2) 使用中国剩余定理和Hensel提升技术，在良好约化条件下推导精确计数公式；3) 应用Lang-Weil不等式建立渐近估计；4) 对于次数不超过2的簇，改进误差项以获得更尖锐的渐近界。
AI.result: 得到了平滑闭子概形上多项式型例外单位的精确计数公式，建立了计数函数的渐近估计公式。特别地，对于次数不超过2的簇，误差项得到显著改进，获得了更尖锐的渐近界。
AI.conclusion: 本文成功将多项式型例外单位的研究从有理整数环扩展到代数数域整数环，为一般代数簇上例外单位的分布提供了系统的计数理论和渐近分析框架，对于次数较低簇获得了更精确的渐近估计表达式。

title: Classification of reductive homogeneous spaces satisfying strict inequality for Benoist-Kobayashi's $ρ$ functions
summary: Let $G$ be a real reductive Lie group and $H$ a reductive subgroup of $G$. Benoist-Kobayashi studied when $L^2(G/H)$ is a tempered representation of $G$. They introduced the functions $ρ$ on Lie algebras and gave a necessary and sufficient condition for the temperedness of $L^2(G/H)$ in terms of an inequality on $ρ$. In a joint work with Y. Oshima, we considered when $L^2(G/H)$ is equivalent to a unitary subrepresentation of $L^2(G)$ and gave a sufficient condition for this in terms of a strict inequality of $ρ$. In this paper, we will classify the pairs $(\mathfrak{g}, \mathfrak{h})$ with $\mathfrak{g}$ complex reductive and $\mathfrak{h}$ complex semisimple which satisfy that strict inequality of $ρ$.

AI.tldr: 该论文分类满足ρ函数严格不等式的复约化李代数与复半单李代数的对（𝔤, 𝔥）。
AI.motivation: 先前Benoist-Kobayashi研究了L²(G/H)何时是G的缓增表示，引入了ρ函数并给出了缓增性的充要条件。作者与Y. Oshima合作考虑了L²(G/H)何时等价于L²(G)的酉子表示，并给出了ρ函数严格不等式形式的充分条件。本论文旨在分类满足该严格不等式的复约化代数对。
AI.method: 使用李代数理论，分析满足ρ函数严格不等式的复约化李代数𝔤和复半单子代数𝔥对，并进行系统分类。
AI.result: 完成了满足ρ函数严格不等式的复约化李代数与复半单李代数对（𝔤, 𝔥）的完全分类。
AI.conclusion: 本论文系统分类了满足ρ严格不等式的复约化-半单李代数对，为进一步研究L²(G/H)与L²(G)酉子表示的等价性提供了代数基础。

title: On rates of convergence in central limit theorems of Selberg and Bourgade
summary: Based on the recent works of Radziwill-Soundararajan and Roberts, we establish a rate of convergence in Bourgade's central limit theorem for shifted Dirichlet $L$-functions. Our results also indicate that the dependence structure in the components of a random vector could have a dramatic impact on the rate of convergence in such a multivariate central limit theorem.

AI.tldr: 通过改进Radziwill-Soundararajan和Roberts的工作，建立了Bourgade中心极限定理中移位Dirichlet L函数收敛速率的精确估计，并揭示了随机向量分量间依赖结构对多元中心极限定理收敛速率的显著影响。
AI.motivation: 研究移位Dirichlet L函数的中心极限定理收敛速率问题，探索随机向量分量间的依赖结构对多元中心极限定理收敛速率的潜在影响，以深化对随机L函数统计特性的理解。
AI.method: 基于Radziwill-Soundararajan和Roberts的最新研究成果，对Bourgade的中心极限定理进行扩展和改进，建立移位Dirichlet L函数的收敛速率估计。
AI.result: 建立了移位Dirichlet L函数中心极限定理的精确收敛速率估计，揭示了随机向量分量间依赖结构对多元中心极限定理收敛速率具有显著影响，可能急剧改变收敛行为。
AI.conclusion: 移位Dirichlet L函数中心极限定理的收敛速率可以通过最新方法得到精确估计，并且随机分量间的依赖结构在多元中心极限定理中起着决定性作用，这一发现对随机矩阵理论和数论研究具有重要意义。

title: On derived categories of module categories over multiring categories
summary: Let $\mathcal{A}$ and $\mathcal{B}$ be subcategories of tensor categories $\mathcal{C}$ and $\mathcal{D}$, respectively, both of which are abelian categories with finitely many isomorphism classes of simple objects. We prove that if their derived categories $\mathbf{D}^b(\mathcal{A})$ and $\mathbf{D}^b(\mathcal{B})$ are left triangulated tensor ideals and are equivalent as triangulated $\mathbf{D}^b(\mathcal{C})$-module categories via an equivalence induced by a monoidal triangulated functor $F:\mathbf{D}^b(\mathcal{C})\rightarrow \mathbf{D}^b(\mathcal{D})$, then the original module categories $\mathcal{A}$ and $\mathcal{B}$ are themselves equivalent. We then apply this result to smash product algebras. Furthermore, the localization theory of module categories and triangulated module categories is investigated.

AI.tldr: 证明了当两个子范畴的导出范畴作为三角范畴模等价时，原始模范畴自身也等价，并将结果应用于smash积代数
AI.motivation: 研究张量范畴中子模范畴之间的等价关系，探索导出范畴级别的等价能否传递到原始范畴级别
AI.method: 利用三角范畴模结构，证明当导出范畴作为左三角张量理想且通过由幺半三角函子诱导的等价时，原始模范畴等价
AI.result: 证明了在某些条件下，导出范畴的三角模等价可推出原始范畴等价，并将结果应用于smash积代数，还研究了模范畴的局部化理论
AI.conclusion: 建立了张量范畴中模范畴等价性的判定准则，为相关代数结构的研究提供了新工具

title: The compositional inverses of some permutation polynomials of the form $x+γ\operatorname{Tr}_q^{q^2}(h(x))$
summary: Recently, Jiang et al. \cite{JIANG2025102522} obtained several classes of Permutation Polynomial of the form $x+γ\operatorname{Tr}_q^{q^2}(h(x))$ over finite fields $\mathbb{F}_{q^2},q=2^n$. In this paper, we find the compositional inverse of six classes of permutation polynomials of this form.

title: Ramaswami Type translation formulae for the polylogarithm functions
summary: In 1934, Ramaswami proved a number of curious translation formulae satisfied by the Riemann zeta function. Such translation formulae, in turn give the meromorphic extension of the Riemann zeta function. In 1954, Apostol extended those identities to establish a family of such similar translation formulae. In this article, we establish many such Ramaswami and Apostol type translation formulae for the Dirichlet series defining the polylogarithm functions. This extended set up has many interesting applications, for example, it allows us to also find some (seemingly new) recurrence relations between the Bernoulli numbers, and use them to deduce some congruence properties of the tangent numbers.

AI.tldr: 本文推广了拉马努金和阿波斯托的平移公式，将其应用于多对数函数的狄利克雷级数，并得到了伯努利数的新递归关系和正切数的同余性质
AI.motivation: 推广1934年Ramaswami和1954年Apostol关于黎曼zeta函数的平移公式到多对数函数，建立更一般的平移恒等式体系
AI.method: 通过狄利克雷级数定义多对数函数，建立Ramaswami-Apostol型平移公式，并推导伯努利数的递归关系
AI.result: 成功建立多对数函数的平移公式，发现了伯努利数的新递归关系，并推导出正切数的同余性质
AI.conclusion: 将Ramaswami和Apostol的平移公式框架扩展到更一般的多对数函数，为特殊函数理论提供了新工具和应用

title: Periodicity of traces of Hecke operators modulo prime powers
summary: We study traces of Hecke operators on spaces of elliptic cusp forms and Drinfeld cusp forms and show that, modulo any prime power, these traces are periodic in the weight.

AI.tldr: 该研究分析了赫克算子在椭圆尖点形式和Drinfeld尖点形式空间上的迹，证明了模任意素数幂时这些迹在权中是周期性的。
AI.motivation: 探索赫克算子在算术几何中不同空间上的迹性质，特别是研究它们在模素数幂情况下的周期行为。
AI.method: 通过研究椭圆尖点形式和Drinfeld尖点形式空间上赫克算子的迹，采用模算术方法分析其周期性。
AI.result: 证明了赫克算子的迹模任意素数幂时在权中具有周期性。
AI.conclusion: 该研究揭示了赫克算子在模素数幂下的周期性规律，为相关算子的算术性质提供了新的理解。

title: Values of ternary quadratic forms at integers and the Berry-Tabor conjecture for 3-tori
summary: Berry and Tabor conjectured in 1977 that spectra of generic integrable quantum systems have the same local statistics as a Poisson point process. We verify their conjecture in the case of the two-point spectral density for a quantum particle in a three-dimensional box, subject to a Diophantine condition on the domain's proportions. A permissible choice of width, height and depth is for example $1,2^{1/3},2^{-1/3}$. This extends previous work of Eskin, Margulis and Mozes (Annals of Math., 2005) in dimension two, where the problem reduces to the quantitative Oppenheim conjecture for quadratic forms of signature $(2,2)$. The difficulty in three and higher dimensions is that we need to consider the distribution of indefinite forms in shrinking rather than fixed intervals, which we are able to resolve for special diagonal forms of signature $(3,3)$ in various scalings, including a rate of convergence. A key step of our approach is to represent the relevant counting problem as an average of a theta function on $\mathrm{SL}(2,\mathbb{Z})^3\backslash\mathrm{SL}(2,\mathbb{R})^3$ over an expanding family of one-parameter unipotent orbits. The asymptotic behaviour of these unipotent averages follows from Ratner's measure classification theorem and subtle escape of mass estimates.

AI.tldr: 验证了Berry-Tabor猜想在三维盒子中量子粒子的两点谱密度情形，要求满足丢番图条件的盒比例，主要利用SL(2,R)³上单参数幂幂轨道平均和Ratner测度分类定理
AI.motivation: Berry和Tabor在1977年提出猜想：一般可积量子系统的谱具有与泊松点过程相同的局部统计性质。本文旨在在三维盒子中量子粒子的两点谱密度情形下验证该猜想
AI.method: 通过将计数问题表示为SL(2,R)³上单参数幂幂轨道平均，利用Ratner测度分类定理和精细的逃逸质量估计，处理收缩区间中的不定形式分布，特别处理(3,3)符号对角形式
AI.result: 在满足丢番图条件的三维盒子比例下，验证了Berry-Tabor猜想对两点谱密度的正确性。一个允许的盒子尺寸选择是1, 2^{1/3}, 2^{-1/3}，获得了收敛速率
AI.conclusion: 该研究将Eskin、Margulis和Mozes在二维情形的结果推广到三维，解决了高维度中收缩区间中不定形式分布的技术难点，为量子系统谱统计提供了重要理论支持

title: Lattice coverings and homogeneous covering congruences
summary: We consider the problem of covering $\mathbb{Z}^2$ with a finite number of sublattices of finite index, satisfying a simple minimality or non-degeneracy condition. We show how this problem may be viewed as a projective (or homogeneous) version of the well-known problem of covering systems of congruences. We give a construction of minimal coverings which produces many, but not all, minimal coverings, and determine all minimal coverings with at most $8$ sublattices.

AI.tldr: 研究用有限个有限指数的子格覆盖ℤ²的问题，探讨其与同余覆盖系统的关系，构建了最小覆盖方法并确定了至多8个子格的所有最小覆盖
AI.motivation: 研究二维整数格ℤ²被有限个有限指数子格覆盖的问题，作为经典同余覆盖系统的射影版本，探索其最小性和非退化条件
AI.method: 将问题视为同余覆盖系统的射影版本，构建了产生大量最小覆盖的结构化方法，但并未覆盖所有情况，并系统性地确定了至多8个子格的所有最小覆盖
AI.result: 成功建立了ℤ²覆盖与同余覆盖系统的联系，构建了产生大量最小覆盖的构造方法，确定了所有至多8个子格的最小覆盖情况
AI.conclusion: 研究揭示了二维整数格覆盖问题与经典同余覆盖系统的深刻联系，提供了系统性的构造方法，并完全解决了至多8个子格的最小覆盖分类问题，为该领域的研究奠定了理论基础
